quantification_methodology.probability_methodology: Per-finding analyst probability estimates based on: (1) regulatory enforcement precedent for compliance risks; (2) industry benchmarks for key person departure rates; (3) market comparables for valuation markdown scenarios; (4) actuarial data for insurance claims

time_profile_classifications.one_time: Single event exposure - face value used (e.g., SEC fines, valuation markdowns)
time_profile_classifications.multi_year: Phased program 3-7 years - DCF at 8% WACC applied (e.g., PM retention revenue loss)
time_profile_classifications.perpetual: Recurring annually indefinitely - NPV at 8% applied (e.g., carried interest tax $3.9M ÷ 8% = $48.75M NPV)

quantification_methodology.correlation_methodology: Pairwise correlation analysis using 0.0-1.0 scale; adjustments applied only for same-root-cause exposures (correlation = 1.0) to avoid double-counting

materiality_analysis.threshold: Substantial likelihood that reasonable shareholder would consider important
materiality_analysis.analysis: Weighted exposure $85.4M (4.74% of $1.8B deal value) substantially exceeds 1% quantitative materiality threshold. Qualitative factors (key person succession risk, perpetual HWM impairment, cyber insurance absence) independently satisfy materiality standard.
